structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Justices Of The Peace, Notaries Public And Commissioners

law.catch_line: Appointment And Jurisdiction Of Justices Of The Peace And Notaries Public
law.text: Justices of the peace and notaries public shall be appointed, and their commissions shall be issued, for the commonwealth, and they shall have jurisdiction throughout the commonwealth when acting under the sole authority of such a commission. Unless otherwise expressly provided they may administer oaths or affirmations in all cases in which an oath or affirmation is required, and take acknowledgments of deeds and other instruments.
